title: Drawing, "Studies: Two heads of children", late 18th century
inscribed: The signature is written in with pencil in the lower right corner: "M Gandolfi."
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
description: Vertical rectangle.  Top: Shown, from the left front, lowered.  Bottom: show from right, raised.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Studies: Two heads of children", late 18th century.
late 18th century. Red crayon on paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund. 1938-88-4363.
